app.name: Steam Library Manager
app.description: Modern library manager for Steam on Linux

common.confirm_exit: Do you really want to exit the application?
common.unsaved_changes_msg:
Changes were made to {filenames}.

Do you really want to exit?

Unsaved changes will be lost!
common.unsaved_changes_save_prompt: You have unsaved changes. Would you like to save them?

main_window.title: Steam Library Manager
main_window.statistics: Collections: {category_count} | Games in Collections: {games_in_categories} | Real Games: {total_games}
main_window.cloud_storage_only: Only available when Cloud Storage is active!
main_window.remove_duplicates_confirm:
Do you really want to search for and automatically remove duplicate collections?

This action cannot be undone!
main_window.create_collection_prompt: Enter the name of the new collection:
main_window.collection_exists: A collection with the name '{name}' already exists!

libraries.title: Steam Library Folders
libraries.confirm_msg: Do you really want to remove this library path?

api.help_text: These keys enable features like playtime sync and cover downloads.
api.info_optional: Optional: Enables playtime sync for non-installed games.

general.restart_required: Changes take effect immediately. A restart is recommended for full consistency.

backup.explanation: Number of backups for localconfig.vdf, sharedconfig.vdf & appinfo.vdf kept before the oldest is overwritten.

game_details.name: Name
game_details.select_placeholder: Select a game to view details

metadata_editor.title: Edit Metadata
metadata_editor.info_tracking: Changes are local and tracked by the app.
metadata_editor.sort_as_help: Leave empty to use game name for sorting
metadata_editor.write_to_vdf_tooltip: Changes will be visible in Steam after restart
metadata_editor.vdf_info: Writing to VDF makes changes visible in Steam. A backup will be created automatically.
metadata_editor.revert_no_original: No original values available to restore.
metadata_editor.revert_confirm: Restore all fields to their original values?
metadata_editor.vdf_warning_text: Changes will be written to Steam's appinfo.vdf file.
metadata_editor.vdf_warning_details: Steam must be restarted for changes to appear. A backup will be created. Continue?
metadata_editor.restore_info: {count} games have modified metadata that can be restored.

pegi_selector.title: Select PEGI Rating
pegi_selector.select: Select the correct PEGI rating for this game:
pegi_selector.instruction: Choose the correct PEGI age rating for this game:

categories.delete_msg: Delete '{category}'? Games will not be removed.
categories.delete_multiple_msg:
Delete these {count} Collections? Games will not be removed.

{category_list}
categories.merge_instruction: Select the target Collection to merge all {count} Collections into:
categories.merge_duplicates_info: Select which collection to keep for each group. Games from all other duplicates will be merged into the selected one.

auto_categorize.title: Auto-Categorize
auto_categorize.warning_backup: Create a backup before making bulk changes!
auto_categorize.cache_warning_message:
Only {cached} of {total} games have cached tag data.

Fetching tags from Steam Store will take approximately {time}.

RECOMMENDATION:
Use 'Edit ‚Üí Fetch Missing Metadata' first to populate the cache, then run Auto-Categorize.

Continue anyway?

steamgrid_setup.title: Setup SteamGridDB
steamgrid_setup.info: To download covers, you need a free API Key.

login.password_info: After login, approve the notification on your Steam Mobile App
login.qr_instructions: Scan QR code with Steam Mobile App
login.qr_hint: Scan QR code with Steam Mobile App...
login.status_scan_qr: Scan QR code with Steam Mobile App...
login.error_no_steam_id: Login failed: No Steam ID received.
login.error_start_qr_session: Failed to start QR authentication session
login.token_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

save.conflict_warning: The cloud storage file was modified externally since it was last loaded. Your changes have been saved, but the external modifications may have been overwritten. A backup was created before saving.

dialogs.steam_running_msg:
Steam Library Manager detected that Steam is running.

Please close Steam.
dialogs.confirm_remove_account: Do you really want to PERMANENTLY remove '{game}' from your account?
dialogs.remove_account_warning:
WARNING: This action is PERMANENT!

You will be redirected to Steam Support where you can remove this game from your account.

This cannot be undone! The game and all related DLCs will be permanently removed.

Do you want to continue?
dialogs.remove_local_warning:
Remove '{game}' from the local Steam configuration?

This removes the entry from localconfig.vdf. Use this for 'ghost' games that no longer exist in your Steam library.

This does NOT remove the game from your Steam account.
dialogs.remove_local_success: '{game}' has been removed from the local configuration.
dialogs.remove_local_error: Failed to remove the game from the local configuration.
dialogs.no_selection: Please select at least one field to modify.
dialogs.empty_collection_message: Collection '{name}' is empty!\nShould the collection be deleted?

profile_setup.title: Profile Setup
profile_setup.header: Welcome! Please select your Steam account:
profile_setup.select_account_first: Please select an account from the list
profile_setup.click_steam_login_button: Please click the 'Login with Steam' button to authenticate
profile_setup.invalid_steamid64: Invalid SteamID64. Please enter a valid 17-digit number
profile_setup.enter_custom_url: Please enter your Steam Community custom URL
profile_setup.custom_url_not_found: Could not find Steam account with this custom URL

steam_running.title: Steam is Running
steam_running.warning_title: Steam must be closed to save changes
steam_running.explanation: Steam overwrites collection files when it exits, which would lose your changes.
steam_running.info:
To save your categories safely:
1. Close Steam completely
2. Save your changes
3. Restart Steam to see the updated categories
steam_running.confirm_message:
This will forcefully close Steam. Any unsaved game progress may be lost.

Continue?
steam_running.steam_closed: Steam has been closed. Your changes will now be saved.
steam_running.close_failed: Failed to close Steam. Please close it manually and try again.

missing_metadata.title: Games with Missing Metadata
missing_metadata.info: These games are missing Developer, Publisher, or Release Date information.

vdf_merger.title: Merge Steam VDF Files
vdf_merger.info: Transfer game Collections from one Steam config file to another. Useful for migrating your library organization from Windows to Linux.
vdf_merger.dry_run_tooltip: Simulate the merge without modifying any files
vdf_merger.confirm_message: This will modify the target file. Are you sure you want to continue?

errors.no_games_found: No games found or error loading.
